import React,{useState} from 'react' import './App.css'; import './icons/css/all.min.css' import './components/Navbar.css' import langs from './components/languages/language.json' import fr from './components/languages/fr.json' import en from './components/languages/en.json' import ar from './components/languages/ar.json' function App() { const [ show, setShow] = useState(false) const [lang, setLang] = useState(0) return ( <> <> {show?
    {langs.map((lang,key)=>(
  • setLang(lang.id)} key={key}> {lang.sub}
    • ))}
:""}
{lang==0 &&(
    {fr.navbar.map((item,key)=>(
  • {item.title}
    • ))}
  • setShow(!show)}>
)} {lang==1 &&(
    {en.navbar.map((item,key)=>(
  • {item.title}
    • ))}
  • setShow(!show)}>
)} {lang==2 &&(
  • setShow(!show)}>
    • {ar.navbar.map((item,key)=>(
  • {item.title}
    • ))}
)}
{fr.carousel.map((item,key)=>(

{item.para}

))}
) } export default App
